email.description: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique.
email.title: Email

description.description: An extended description to help users determine the purpose of a group. For example, you can include information about who should join the group, the types of messages to send to the group, links to FAQs about the group, or related groups.
description.title: Description

changePasswordAtNextLogin.description: Whether the user is forced to change their password at next login
changePasswordAtNextLogin.title: Change Password At Next Login

primaryEmail.description: The user's primary email address. This property is required in a request to create a user account. The primaryEmail must be unique and cannot be an alias of another user.
primaryEmail.title: Primary Email

type.description: The type of the email account
type.title: Type

password.description: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.
password.title: Password

primary.description: Whether this is the user's primary phone number. A user may only have one primary phone number.
primary.title: Primary

makeAdmin.description: Whether to make a user a super administrator
makeAdmin.title: Make Admin

anyOf.description: The value can be the user's primary email address, alias email address, or unique user ID
anyOf.title: User ID

anyOf.title: User ID

anyOf.title: User ID

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.title: Return All

email.description: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique
email.title: Email

password.description: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.
password.title: Password

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

customer.description: The unique ID for the customer's Google Workspace account. In case of a multi-domain account, to fetch all groups for a customer, fill this field instead of domain.
customer.title: Customer

userId.description: Email or immutable ID of the user if only those groups are to be listed, the given user is a member of. If it's an ID, it should match with the ID of the user object.
userId.title: User ID

orderBy.description: Property to use for sorting results
orderBy.title: Order By

sortOrder.description: Whether to return results in ascending or descending order
sortOrder.title: Sort Order

query.description: Query string search. Complete documentation is at.
query.title: Query

domain.description: The domain name. Use this field to get fields from only one domain.
domain.title: Domain

viewType.description: Whether to fetch the administrator-only or domain-wide public view of the user. For more information, see Retrieve a user as a non-administrator.
viewType.title: View Type

showDeleted.description: Whether to retrieve the list of deleted users
showDeleted.title: Show Deleted

sortOrder.title: Sort Order

query.description: Free text search terms to find users that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties. For more information on constructing user queries, see Search for Users.
query.title: Query

domain.description: The domain name. Use this field to get fields from only one domain.
domain.title: Domain

username.description: The username that will be set to the user. Example: If you domain is example.com and you set the username to jhon then the user's final email address will be jhon@example.com.
username.title: Username

anyOf.description: Identifies the group in the API request. The value can be the group's email address, group alias, or the unique group ID.
anyOf.title: Group ID
